overview: Misao, who got married after living with Masaya, is living a happy life, but one regret is that she does not have children. She tries to have children, but she cannot determine the cause of the infertility. Then, one day, she accidentally receives a visit to a place called 'Tokyo Fertility Research Institute', but the director of the institute commits a crime against Misao, and that evening she is deceived by the lies of Masaya's boss who was interested in Misao.
title: The lewd affair of the new wife who wants to be pregnant
